instruction: Hard work is the key to success if you don't work hard you can't success in life.
You need to be faster than all other players otherwise you will be leg behind
Always try to be concentrated to your work don't think about other foul things.
Never give up learning , always try to learn new things.
Stay motivated, never be depressed . Follow the rules and enjoy.
Practice more and more until you are died, practice makes a man perfect.
